text: The Hangshao Line () or Hangzhou–Shaoxing Intercity Railway (), also known as Keqiao Line (), is a rapid transit line under construction. It is running west–east from Xiaoshan District, Hangzhou to Keqiao District, Shaoxing. Type B trains will be used in the service. The line is scheduled to open in 2020. ==Stations== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="2" | Station Name ! rowspan="2" | Connections ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" | Distance |- ! ! |- |Guniangqiao | | (Hangzhou Metro) | | |- |Yaqian | | | | |- |Yangxunqiao | | | | |- |Qianqing | | | | |- |Keqiao West | | (via Qianqing railway station) | | |- |Xisha Road | | | | |- |Hu'an Road | | | | |- |Jishan Road | | | | |- |Kehua Road | | | | |- |Diyang Road | | (Shaoxing Metro) | | |} ==References== Category:Rapid transit in China
title: Hangzhou–Shaoxing Intercity Railway
